column4: memo - check to see whether any of the firewalls are blocking ping requests
all of the sudden enemy territory and open arena aren't full-screening properly
at low resolutions, my 3d games now occupy a fraction of the screen whereas before they 'stretched out' to the full screen
any ideas about what may have changedZ
makky - so what happens when you try to connect wirelessly?
makki - fire up a console and type "iwconfig"
- i typed in iwconfig and for 'wifi0:' it says: " No wireless extensions"
- it has 4 different things: "lo, eth0, wifi0, and ath0" all except ath0 say "No wireless extensions"
- ath0 has way too much for me to type
- it does not say anything: "ESSID:==  Nickname:== "
- yea i forgot... now i did sudo
- this time nothing happened... i pressed enter and it shows new command line.. for me to type new command..
